description:
Qualifications

Required:

Analytical skills necessary to evaluate the cost effectiveness of purchasing options

Ability to communicate effectively in writing and verbally

Ability to read and interpret terms and conditions of contracts.

Working level of proficiency in the use of standard spreadsheet and word processing

software

Ability to set priorities and complete ongoing tasks with competing deadlines, with

frequent interruptions, with high degree of accuracy

Preferred

Bachelor’s Degree or equivalent combination of education and experience

1 – 3 years of Purchasing experience

Some knowledge of the organization’s departments and operations required in order to

meet their procurement needs

Understands procurement policies and systems such as Procurement, Travel systems, etc.
